Posts.Content: My daughter is 26 and recently diagnosed with breast cancer.  Since she is brca 1 + the drs think the best way to 'save a life' is for a double masectomy.  If you were in your 20's and have survived this journey, we'd love to hear from you.
Posts.Title: Any 20 something year olds who have had a double mas?

Posts.Content: Trying to make contact with any young women (20-28) who have been diagnosed with and survived breast cancer.
Posts.Title: women in their 20's with breast cancer?
